task.title: Selecting a Document Portion in Editing Window

context.p: You can select any portion of a document.
To select a portion of a document in the Editing Window, do the following:

step.cmd: Indicate the beginning of the portion.

info.p: Click the beginning of the portion in the Editing Window.

step.cmd: Indicate the end of the portion.

info.p: Indicate the end of the portion in the Editing Window one of these ways:

choice.p: Holding down the Shift key, click the end of the portion.
Holding down the left mouse button, drag the mouse till the end of the portion.

note.p: When the end or the beginning of a portion crosses an element's border, selection will depend on the Balance Selection mode.
